content.text:
[@aran](@WeZBYERzjvfOVlgU7vMz7RSheqe4WaGEd87ewbMvnvQ=.ed25519) [@greg](@JoiN9c9+xO0jgu0gg5yflTf+L1peLTBneFHjrKbmcKo=.ed25519) 

Basically [this](%bOpONiQ8cv5JxKHHpEKsLC7zaSBd3Q1LL+ncXpUPlhE=.sha256), where someone joined a public pub and then started spamming automated messages with no real content. I don't think that they used any blobs (which would have been *much* more effective), but their feed is seemingly endless.

According to the timestamps it was only active around 7 months ago, but I haven't seen it until today.
